prioritizing-actions: Actions are being prioritized for your city. Please check back in 15 minutes.
generate-climate-actions-description: Check out your key actions for this category. Explore them to gain insights and create draft implementation plans for each.
no-actions-found-title: Your top climate actions are being processed
no-actions-found-description: This process can take up to 15 mins. You'll get an email and see them here when done
generate-climate-actions-widget-descript: You can create implementation plans for each of the selected actions. Feel free to browse the complete list of actions below and choose which ones you want to display here.
integrate-renewables-into-municipal-wate: Integrate renewables into municipal water systems
no-activity-data-title: Not enough data to generate your top climate actions yet
no-activity-data-description: You need to complete at least 1 activity in your inventory to generate your top actions list.
error-generating-actions-description: We encountered an error while generating your climate actions. Please try again.
generating-climate-actions: Your top climate actions are being processed
generating-climate-actions-description: This process can take up to 15 mins. You'll get an email and see them here when done
top-actions-for-your-city-description: These are the top 40 actions we recommend based on your GHG inventory and City Context data. You will find 20 actions for Mitigation and 20 for Adaptation in their respective tabs. Re-running the prioritizer after any relevant data update or change is recommended.
actions-for-your-city-description: These are the top 40 actions we recommend based on your GHG inventory, Climate Risk Assessment, and City Context data. You will find 20 actions for Mitigation and 20 for Adaptation in their respective tabs.
click-action-description: Click the button below to start listing your top climate actions.
ready-to-generate-climate-actions-title: You are ready to generate your climate actions list
encourage-renewable-energy-policies: Encourage renewable energy policies at the municipal level
top-actions-tip: Your top actions list is based on your current inventory progress. We recommend completing it before using this module.
ranked-and-unranked-actions-description: Here are the climate initiatives that our AI model has identified as having the greatest potential impact for your city. You can select any three actions to create detailed plans in the upper section. Additionally, feel free to download this table to share with stakeholders.
plan-generation-started-description: Your action plan is being generated. You'll receive an email notification when it's ready.
plan-generation-failed-description: Failed to start plan generation. Please try again.
reprioritization-started-description: Your climate actions are being re-prioritized with the latest data. You'll receive an email when complete.
reprioritization-failed-description: Failed to start reprioritization. Please try again.
